about_the_game:
A musically interwoven light RPG with beat-based driving and stunning visual effects.


Explore Sunset City and its cast of colorful characters!
- Earn money doing missions
- Purchase and modify cars
- Cruise into the pulsing night and surround yourself with the rhythm

What people are saying:


"What in the Knight Rider, leg warmers, windbreakers, 80's retrowave acid trip is this?!" - Reddit user Pandarol.

"Cool game!" - Stream viewer

"I have Hallucinogen persisting perception disorder now - thanks!" - Early Access tester.

Features:


  • Beat based driving & gameplay
  • A feast of visual effects
  • Buy & Modify your vehicles
  • A large city to explore with lots of characters
  • Use your own song library or choose from a variety of included music stations

Explore a cavalcade of retro-styled visuals as you navigate the streets of Sunset City in the musical world of your choosing. Bring your own sweet collection of tunes, explore a library of curated radio stations, or pop in the original soundtrack.
